title: Droidbench
description:
DroidBench is one of a kind Custom benchmarking tool ,it stresses your smartphone and checks its performance in various daily usage areas.You can compare your stats with others using compare section,one can also view previous results and compare then graphically.Moreover a full System info is given to user about his/her smartphone.

1. Counter
the counter is basically used to determine how fast your smartphone
can count to a specefic number.The lower the time it takes in counting , the better is cpu performance.

2. SQL
This benchmark tests how fast your smartphone can execute sql queries,database storage is used by almost every app and this tool checks how fast data can be written ,read ,updated in a database.

3. Memory
This benchmark calculates the speed of data read/write on your SD card and internal storage.

4. PI
PI=(22/7) yes the mathematical PI,this benchmark uses machins formula to calculate the value of PI upto n digits,and in meantime calculating that value it stresses your CPU to full extent and calculates time taken to calculate that value...more powerful the cpu less the time taken.

5. NET
this benchmark calculates the internet speed of your phone i.e the uploading and download speed

5. MULTITHREAD
This benchmark checks the multithread handling capacity of your smartphone,by using two threads to calculate to a predefined number simultaneously,it calculates the time taken.lower the time,better the your cpu cores are.

6. WebBench
This benchmark checks the capacity and smoothness of your inbuilt android browser.

7. System info
It tells you everything about your smartphone.
